org.jets3t.service.utils
Class FileComparer

java.lang.Object
  org.jets3t.service.utils.FileComparer
public class FileComparer
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities to compare files based on MD5 hashes of the files' contents.

buildFileMap

public static java.util.Map buildFileMap(java.io.File rootDirectory,
                                         java.lang.String fileKeyPrefix)
Builds a File Map containing all the files and directories inside the given root directory, where the map's key for each file is the relative path to the file. File keys are delimited with '/' characters.

Parameters:
rootDirectory - The root directory containing the files/directories of interest. The root directory is not included in the result map.
fileKeyPrefix - A prefix added to each file path key in the map, e.g. the name of the root directory the files belong to. If provided, a '/' suffix is always added to the end of the prefix. If null or empty, no prefix is used.
Returns:
A Map of file path keys to File objects.
See Also:
buildDiscrepancyLists(Map, Map), buildS3ObjectMap(S3Service, S3Bucket, String, S3Object[], S3ServiceEventListener)

buildDiscrepancyLists

public static FileComparerResults buildDiscrepancyLists(java.util.Map filesMap,
                                                        java.util.Map s3ObjectsMap)
                                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.IOException,
                                                        java.text.ParseException
Compares the contents of a directory on the local file system with the contents of an S3 resource. This comparison is performed on a map of files and a map of S3 objects previously generated using other methods in this class.

Parameters:
filesMap - a map of keys/Files built using the method buildFileMap(File, String)
s3ObjectsMap - a map of keys/S3Objects built using the method buildS3ObjectMap(S3Service, S3Bucket, String, S3ServiceEventListener)
Returns:
an object containing the results of the file comparison.
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException
java.text.ParseException
